name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sakura - Japanese Cherry Blossoms -
detailed_description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Sakura - Japanese Cherry Blossoms -" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • View of Mt.Fuji with Uruigawa Rivedr, Shizuoka
  • Abe Monju-in, Nara
  • Kitten and Cherry Blossoms
  • Takada Castle, Niigata
  • Miharu Takizakura, Fukushima
  • Kawazu-zakura in Minamiizu, Shizuoka
  • Chidorigafuchi, Tokyo
  • Megurogawa River, Tokyo
  • Tsuyama Castle, Okayama
  • Mt. Fuji and Cherry Blossoms
